name: Button Mashers
blurb: Three friends play video games while doing live commentary on their new Youtube channel, ButtonMashers!

rewards.reward: $1 is enough for us! Remember, anything helps! With a $1 pledge, you'll get to see an un-aired episode of ButtonMashers and your name forever in our description box! Kind of cool, if we do say so ourselves.
You guys have upped the ante a little bit! With a $10 pledge, we'll send you two un-aired episodes of our show and your name is our description box for life! Trust me, the extra episode is worth it!

You guys get a little bit of special treatment. For a pledge of $25, we'll send you a customized ButtonMasher's sticker, THREE un-aired episodes of our show and your name is our description box for all eternity!

Here is where things get interesting! For a pledge of $50, not only do you get a customized ButtonMasher's sticker, three un-aired episodes of our show, and your name is our description box until the end of time, but you'll also receive a personal video-thank-you from us!

You guys have officially crossed the threshold! In addition to EVERYTHING above, we'll send you a personalized episode where we play a game of your choice! You tell us which game you'd like to see us play and we'll record it! That's right; your own episode!

Now the real fun begins! For a pledge of $250, you'll get everything above--but I think that goes without saying. You get your own episode, the sticker, everything! However, in addition to your name is our description box forever, you'll get a special sneak peak at the list of games we plan on recording. Why? Because you get to pick one of the games from our list so we can personally shout you out on our episode! Then, we'll mail you an awesome ButtonMashers t-shirt with a special "Thank You" message written on the back!

One step away from being the top pledger! That's cause for celebration! Okay, so as you've assumed, you get everything above. The t-shirt, the video message, the special episode, EVERYTHING. But, you will also be listed as a producer of our show! Producers are few and far between, which means you're the glue that holds our show together. And because of that, we will video-chat with you LIVE while we record an episode! You'll be on our show for the world to see, and you'll get to do commentary with us!

Oh, man. You guys hold a special, special place in our hearts. For your $1,000 pledge, you get it all: your name is our description, three un-aired episodes, a ButtonMasher's sticker, a personal video-thank-you, your choice of game for an episode, shout-out multiple times, a ButtonMashers t-shirt with a custom message on the back, producer credit, and live-chat while we record an episode. But there's one final thing! We will create an animated version of you and put you at the end of an episode! AND, if you happen to live close enough to us, you can swing by and record an episode with us!
